org.infogrid.comm

Class ReturnSynchronizerEndpoint<T extends CarriesInvocationId>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.infogrid.comm.AbstractWaitingEndpoint<T>
      • org.infogrid.comm.ReturnSynchronizerEndpoint<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the message type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageEndpointListener<T>, org.infogrid.util.logging.CanBeDumped

    public class ReturnSynchronizerEndpoint<T extends CarriesInvocationId>
extends AbstractWaitingEndpoint<T>
implements org.infogrid.util.logging.CanBeDumped
    An communication endpoint that notifies a ReturnSynchronizer when a received response to a sent message has arrived. This is useful to implement RPC-style communications on top of the ping-pong framework without blocking the calling thread.

      • call

        public void call(T message)
          throws org.infogrid.util.ReturnSynchronizerException.NoTransactionOpen
        Invoke the front leg of the remote procedure call.
        Parameters:
        message - the message that represents the argument to the call
        Throws:
        org.infogrid.util.ReturnSynchronizerException.NoTransactionOpen - thrown if a ReturnSynchronizer transaction had not been opened previously

      • call

        public void call(T message,
                 java.lang.Long existingKeyForQuery,
                 long timeout)
          throws org.infogrid.util.ReturnSynchronizerException.NoTransactionOpen
        Invoke the front leg of the remote procedure call.
        Parameters:
        message - the message that represents the argument to the call
        existingKeyForQuery - non-null if this call is made to fulfill an existing query only partially performed so far. This is the key for that existig query.
        timeout - the timeout, in milliseconds, until the call times out
        Throws:
        org.infogrid.util.ReturnSynchronizerException.NoTransactionOpen - thrown if a ReturnSynchronizer transaction had not been opened previously

        Returns:
